venue.name: Villa Victoria's Jorge Hernandez Cultural Center

item.description:
Latin American Classical Music Series
SUNDAY, APRIL 10, 3PM | FREE

Join us for this exciting Latin American classical music celebration in collaboration with the New England Conservatory and with performances by Boston LatinAmerican Orchestra, the first chamber ensemble dedicated exclusively to Latin American music. In addition, famous choral conductor María Guinard will offer an open rehearsal with Boston Children’s Chorus and a discuss El Sistema.

Open rehearsal with María Guinard and Boston Children’s Chorus:
WEDNESDAY APRIL 6, 4:30PM | FREE

María Guinard talk on El Sistema:
WEDNESDAY APRIL 6, 6:30PM | FREE

Public Concert:
SUNDAY, APRIL 10, 3:00PM | FREE

Call (617) 927-1717 for more information

Directions: http://mapq.st/gKYWM9
item.how_to_find_us: Nos reuniremos adentro cerca de la entrada del Centro Villa Victoria de las artes
item.why: Es gratis y oiremos musica bonita de compositores hispanos y brasileros: ASTOR PIAZZOLLA, HEITOR VILLA-LOBOS, JIMMY LÓPEZ, ALFONSO LÓPEZ C, GUILLERMO MARÍN, BALTASAR MARTÍNEZ Y COMPAÑÓN http://www.villavictoriaarts.org/performances_spr041011.html

group.name: The MetroWest-Greater Boston Castellano Speakers Group

item.name: Concierto gratis - musica clasica latina - Boston Latin American Orchestra
